name: Scribbles Of Madness
description:
Scribbles of Madness is a 3D-Isometric(ish)-Combat-Platformer where one of the only platforms is the player character's box cutter. 

Use your box cutter both as a weapon and means of travel to traverse the mind of a mad writer. The further you go the more the story unravels, but so does the writer's sanity. Will you find your way through the twisted scribbles, or will they consume you?
